# Paths Reference for Vista Graphics path operations. ## Path Commands - **move**: Move to position without drawing - **line**: Draw line to position - **curve**: Draw quadratic curve - **arc**: Draw arc - **close**: Close path ## Basic Path `draw canvas [ path [ move 100 100 line 200 100 line 150 200 close ] ]` ## Curved Path `draw canvas [ path [ move 100 200 curve 100 100 200 100 200 200 ] ]` ## Path with Stroke `draw canvas [ pen red path [ move 100 100 line 200 100 line 150 200 close ] ]` ## See Also - [Polygons](/wiki/graphics/drawing/polygons/) - Polygon drawing - [Pen & Fill](/wiki/graphics/drawing/pen-fill/) - Styling
